page.title: 12LAW AND ORDER
page.content: The main police station for this area is at Ruabon.Based here are 16 constables,2 sergeants,2 inspectors and 1 chief inspector.The chief inspector is in charge of the whole area.There are out stations at Cefn Mawr,Rhosymedre,Acrefair and Pen-y-cae.There is a constable based at each of these stations for 8 hours a day.The constable's main job is to catch people doing wrong,traffic control,attending court and being attached to the local community council.Police are there to help you if you have lost pets,property or you are lost yourself.You can help your local police by reporting if you see anyone causing damage.There is a lot of vandalism especially to telephone kiosks and windows.There used to be a court at Ruabon up to about 15 years ago.
